question: Where was the School of the Wolf headquartered, and what happened to it during the second half of the 12th century?
answer: The School of the Wolf was headquartered at Kaer Morhen in Kaedwen. During the second half of the 12th century, it suffered a massive attack by an enraged mob led by a group of mages and priests, which resulted in all witchers present at the keep being killed.
